reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The Non-Governmental Organization Voice of Roma Ashkali and Egyptians was established with a general mandate to improve the lives of Kosovo Roma Ashkali and Egyptian (RAE) communities and further support their integration into Kosovo society by advocating for their rights living conditions and general situation before the competent domestic and international authorities and/or organizations. Roma inclusion is a crucial issue of the VoRAE program. The objectives of this project are: a) Improve the general le vel of education among RAE communities by investing into their secondary and university education and by offering activities that support school enrolment b)Break social barriers for easier integration of Roma community in post-war Kosovo society by learn ing Albanian language and c) To build and strengthen the capacity of VoRAE in Kosovo to fully execute its mission and vision and foster integration of RAE communities in Kosovo society.
